36 
38 //
39 // Defines the ValueFunction class. Templated on the tracker/planner state
40 // (TS/PS), tracker/planner control (TC/PC), tracker/planner dynamics (TD/PC),
41 // and bound (B).
42 //
44 
45 #ifndef FASTRACK_VALUE_VALUE_FUNCTION_H
46 #define FASTRACK_VALUE_VALUE_FUNCTION_H
47 
48 #include <fastrack/dynamics/dynamics.h>
49 #include <fastrack/utils/types.h>
50 #include <fastrack/utils/uncopyable.h>
51 
52 #include <ros/ros.h>
53 
54 namespace fastrack {
55 namespace value {
56 
57 using dynamics::Dynamics;
58 
59 template< typename TS, typename TC, typename TD,
60  typename PS, typename PC, typename PD, typename B >
61 class ValueFunction : private Uncopyable {
62 public:
63  virtual ~ValueFunction() {}
64 
65  // Initialize from a ROS NodeHandle.
66  virtual bool Initialize(const ros::NodeHandle& n) = 0;
67 
68  // Value and gradient at particular relative states.
69  virtual double Value(const TS& tracker_x, const PS& planner_x) const = 0;
70  virtual TS Gradient(const TS& tracker_x, const PS& planner_x) const = 0;
71 
72  // Get the optimal control given the tracker state and planner state.
73  inline TC OptimalControl(const TS& tracker_x, const PS& planner_x) const {
74  const TS relative_x = tracker_x.RelativeTo(planner_x);
75  return tracker_dynamics_.OptimalControl(relative_x, Gradient(relative_x));
76  }
77 
78  // Accessors.
79  inline const B& TrackingBound() const { return bound_; }
80  inline const TD& TrackerDynamics() const { return tracker_dynamics_; }
81  inline const PD& PlannerDynamics() const { return planner_dynamics_; }
82 
83  // Priority of the optimal control at the given tracker and planner states.
84  // This is a number between 0 and 1, where 1 means the final control signal
85  // should be exactly the optimal control signal computed by this
86  // value function.
87  virtual double Priority(const TS& tracker_x, const PS& planner_x) const = 0;
88 
89 protected:
90  explicit ValueFunction()
91  : initialized_(false) {}
92 
93  // Load parameters and register callbacks.
94  virtual bool LoadParameters(const ros::NodeHandle& n) = 0;
95  virtual bool RegisterCallbacks(const ros::NodeHandle& n) = 0;
96 
97  // Member variables to be instantiated by derived classes after
98  // reading the necessary parameters from the ROS parameter server.
99  // Keep a copy of the tracker and planner dynamics.
100  TD tracker_dynamics_;
101  PD planner_dynamics_;
102 
103  // Keep a copy of the tracking errror bound.
104  B bound_;
105 
106  // Flag for whether this class has been initialized yet.
107  bool initialized_;
108 
109  // Name of this class, for use in debug messages.
110  std::string name_;
111 }; //\class ValueFunction
112 
113 } //\namespace value
114 } //\namespace fastrack
115 
116 #endif
